name: Chandrashekar Lakshmi Narayanan
content: Chandrashekar LakshminarayananSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationChandrashekar LakshminarayananAssistant ProfessorComputer Science and EngineeringIIT Madraschandrashekar@cse.iitm.ac.in, Extn: 4358About MeI am currently an Assistant Professor at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Madras. Prior to joining IIT Madras, I was an Assistant Professor at IIT Palakkad for a period of 3 years (Aug 2018 - Aug 2021). In the past, I was a research scientist at Google-DeepMind (London), and a post-doctoral fellow at the University of Alberta. I obtained by masters and PhD from the Indian Institute of Science, and I did my B. Tech at the National Institute of Technology Trichy.
